description: Alexei Navalny is seriously ill in a Siberian hospital - doctors say they are trying to save his life.
title: Alexei Navalny: 'Poisoned' Russian opposition leader in a coma
title_page: Alexei Navalny: 'Poisoned' Russian opposition leader in a coma - BBC News
maintext: He was taken ill during that jail sentence. Doctors diagnosed him with "contact dermatitis" but he said he had never had any acute allergic reactions and his own doctor suggested he might have been exposed to "some toxic agent". Mr Navalny also said he thought he may have been poisoned.
